text: Burlinsky District () is an administrativeLaw #28-ZS and municipalLaw #37-ZS district (raion), one of the fifty-nine in Altai Krai, Russia. It is located in the northwest of the krai. The area of the district is . Its administrative center is the rural locality (a selo) of Burla. Population: The population of Burla accounts for 35.7% of the district's total population. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * * Category:Districts of Altai Krai
title: Burlinsky District
